overview: An easy-go-lucky guy Karthik  who has an attitude to not say sorry to anyone falls for Meghana at first sight itself. One day,under critical circumstances, Meghana, who had already promised her father that she will never love anyone, herself proposes to Karthik in front of her father. The father-daughter duo try to rectify the daughter’s mistake, but there’s a huge hurdle for them.
title: Leharaayi
